verbs.description: hornify (third-person singular simple present hornifies, present participle hornifying, simple past and past participle hornified)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To make horny, or like horn in texture; to harden.
examples: We see in Figure 8 that the hornified cuticle runs continuously over the cementum  […]

entries.meaning: (transitive, colloquial) To make horny; to excite sexually; to arouse.
